pr_title: doc(service): Add headers for getter and settter of model Id

timeline.message: add headers for get and set of model Id
add headers for get and set of model Id

timeline.bodyText: Is this kind of language typical? "Getter to get" and "Setter to set" seems redundant.
timeline.author: drwill-ms

replies.bodyText: Yes that's the language I have seen for other get and set method.
replies.author: bikamani

replies.bodyText: Then the other places should be updated. This isn't a good description. "Gets the model Id" is much better
replies.author: timtay-microsoft

revised_code.chunk:
diff --git a/service/iot-service-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/service/devicetwin/DeviceTwinDevice.java b/service/iot-service-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/service/devicetwin/DeviceTwinDevice.java
index c1c6d1601..ace2505fa 100644
--- a/service/iot-service-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/service/devicetwin/DeviceTwinDevice.java
+++ b/service/iot-service-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/service/devicetwin/DeviceTwinDevice.java

@@ -645,17 +645,17 @@ public class DeviceTwinDevice
     }
 
     /**
-     * Getter to get model Id
+     * Getter for a model Id
      * @return The DTDL model Id of the device
      * The value will be null for a non-pnp device.
-     * The value will be null for a pnp device until the device connects and registers with the model Id.
+     * The value will be null for a pnp device until the device connects and registers with a model Id.
      */
     public String getModelId() {
         return this.modelId;
     }
 
     /**
-     * Setter to set model Id
+     * Setter for a model Id
      *
      * @param modelId is the DTDL model Id of the device
      */

timeline.author: drwill-ms
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -644,10 +644,21 @@ private TwinCollection setToMap(Set<Pair> set)
         return map;
     }
 
+    /**
+     * Getter to get model Id
+     * @return The DTDL model Id of the device
+     * The value will be null for a non-pnp device.
+     * The value will be null for a pnp device until the device connects and registers with the model Id.

+++ b/service/iot-service-client/src/main/java/com/microsoft/azure/sdk/iot/service/devicetwin/DeviceTwinDevice.java

@@ -645,17 +645,17 @@ public class DeviceTwinDevice
     }
 
     /**
-     * Getter to get model Id
+     * Getter for a model Id
      * @return The DTDL model Id of the device
      * The value will be null for a non-pnp device.
-     * The value will be null for a pnp device until the device connects and registers with the model Id.
+     * The value will be null for a pnp device until the device connects and registers with a model Id.
      */
     public String getModelId() {
         return this.modelId;
     }
 
     /**
-     * Setter to set model Id
+     * Setter for a model Id
      *
      * @param modelId is the DTDL model Id of the device
      */
